sys_script_include.description: Utils Script Include for the NeedIt application.
sys_script_include.name: NeedItUtils

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_0bd995182f342110d100d7a72799b604
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_58872_needit.NeedItUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Utils Script Include for the NeedIt application.</description><name>NeedItUtils</name><script><![CDATA[// rightnow stores the current time
  var rightnow = new GlideDateTime();
  // Create a GlideDateTime object for the When needed date
  var whenNeeded = new GlideDateTime(current.u_when_needed);

  // If the When needed date is before rightnow, do not write the record to the database
  // Output an error message to the screen
  if(whenNeeded.before(rightnow)){
  gs.addErrorMessage("When needed date cannot be in the past.  Your request has not been saved to the database.");
  current.setAbortAction(true);
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-01-30 20:04:04</sys_created_on><sys_id>0bd995182f342110d100d7a72799b604</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>NeedItUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_0bd995182f342110d100d7a72799b604</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-01-30 20:04:04</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
